descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Hi guys!!
[/b][/size]
I made Pretty Khajiit Folower!!
She is Ra'bhora Khajiit follower.
You can find her at  roof of barracks in whiterun.

If you want to customize her, please use "Amazing Follower Tweak" or other mods.
I like "Amazing Follower Tweaks".

[b][size=4]I Use that Mods[/size][/b]

- UNP BLESSED BODY - UNPB REDUX PROJECT - UNPB Body NMM Installer v2-5-2 FIX
    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?[/url]
- Feminine Khajiit Textures for CBBE-UNP
    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62193/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62193/?[/url]
- Helmets - Khajiit Ears and Helmet Hair 
    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6362/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6362/?[/url]

[size=4][b]Trouble shoot[/b][/size]

If you lost her, You can call her this command.

 `prid <Her RefID>`
 `moveto player`

 Q: I don't know her RefID!!
 A: No plobrem! We can use this tool -> TesvRefidPicker
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72356/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72356/?[/url]

 1. launch this tool
 2. load `Skyrim.esm` and this esp
 3. check her RefId.

Enjoy!
author: Ogaaaan
